column4: how does it make any sense that my gnome worked like a charm 30 minutes ago and now dead?
what's wrong with it?  What does it do or doesn't do?
it just hangs there  it wont log in
hmmmm,  try ctrl+alt+backspace yet?  did that do anything?

Maybe something weird just got corrupted.  If you still can't login, try  a different user.  You can press F3  get to a console, log in there and then create a new user.  Then I would try Gnome again with that user
i havent been able to create new users for about 2 weeks now
Even from the console?  By pressing F3 can you log on there?
Well what's it do when you try to logon to the straight console?  ANy errors or anything to go off of?
